medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began after colonoscopy; felt fatigued and had a temperature of 101°F that evening. Over two days, the temperature ranged from 99°F to 101°F. Developed right-sided back pain that progressed to right upper quadrant (RUQ) and epigastric pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cardiac stents, hypertension, vocal cord biopsy
